title: The Death of Viginia, daughter of Marcus Claudius
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and gray wash, pen and ink, black chalk, on paper
description: At right the group of Appius and Marcus Claudius.  In the center, Virginia dying at the feel of her father.  In the fore-and- background at left excited people and soldiers.
name: Drawing
